features: ✔Crystal Clear Sound: Conduct advanced noise-canceling technology, the Conference microphone can easily capture clear sound with a 360°sensitivity pickup range(3m/10ft), 10 times better than a traditional computer microphone. (𝐍𝐎𝐓𝐄: 𝐈𝐭'𝐬 𝐣𝐮𝐬𝐭 𝐚 𝐦𝐢𝐜𝐫𝐨𝐩𝐡𝐨𝐧𝐞, 𝐧𝐨𝐭 𝐚 𝐬𝐩𝐞𝐚𝐤𝐞𝐫）

✔Plug and Play: Connected to a computer through a USB cable(1.8m/6ft), no drivers to install, hassle-free installation, well compatible with Windows and macOS. (NOT compatible with Raspberry Pi/Android)

✔Compact and Versatile: This microphone are small and portable. You can put it in your pocket or briefcase and take it wherever you want. Perfect for meetings, interviews, podcasting, home studio recording, YouTube, Twitch, Skype, Face Time, Gaming, and more.

✔Convenient Mute Button - Quickly mute/unmute your microphone: the built-in Indicator LED lights tell you the working status (Green Light: Microphone has been connected; Flashing Green Light: Working Mode; RED Light: Mute Mode)
✔Advanced Cancellation Technology - Built-in high-performance CMTECK CCS2.0 SMART CHIP can effectively block the noise and eliminate echo, better than a traditional computer microphone

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: High Definition Sound & Noise-Cancelling Technology Built-in CMTECK CCS2.0 Sound Card can effectively block the noise and eliminate echo, enables you to enjoy clearer voice for hassle-free communication, better than traditional computer microphone. Unique LED Working Indicator • Built-in LED Indicator lights tell you the working status: [Green Light]: Connected[RED Light]: Mute Mode Convenient Mute Button • You will enjoy a built-in mute switch, so you can mute the sound in an instant. • No additional setting is required.

Omnidirectional Polar Pattern • Coverage Angle: 360°, equally sensitive to sound from all directions. • Highly sensitive microphone can transmit your voice accurately, fluently and clearly. Dual-Capsule Design • Traditional microphones usually have a single capsule. • CM003 Mic has two omnidirectional capsules which can provide a larger pick-up range and better sound quality Plug-and-play USB connectivity (no drivers required) • Easy to use, no driver needed • COMPATIBILITY: Compatible with standard including Windows systems 10 / 8.1 / 8/7 / Vista / XP, Mac OS (NOT compatible with Raspberry Pi/Linux/Android）

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product, good price
reviews.reviewText: The device arrived on time and installed easily. I did need to swap my microphone in Settings, but that's easy. It took a bit of hunting around as the instructions are a bit sketchy, but it only took a few minutes to get it done. the microphone needed to be plugged into my PC, daisy chaining it off a USB port in a monitor didn't work. Now that all that is covered, it has an attractive look, seems to be built well, and functions just as a desktop microphone should. No one has trouble hearing me, and the mute button on the unit works well. I bought this unit because I had to raise my voice to be heard on the microphone built into my laptop. This fixed the issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Picks up voice clearly for a great price
reviews.reviewText: Looking for a smaller mic for my computer to use with Google, I found this conference mic. Because of it's shape, is out of the way of the monitor, and can be easily placed. Tested it today, and had no problem understanding my voice, even a little further from me. For that particular purpose, it works well, at a great price. It includes a mute button, which can be handy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good mic for the price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this microphone in order to host hybrid in-person/online DnD sessions at my house. The first one we ordered was faulty and didn't work. The company was quick to send us a replacement, which we still use occasionally three years later.The setup was a little tricky and required us to change some settings on the microphone's digital software in order to actually pick up sound. I think we watched some YouTube videos to figure that out. Once we got it working though, it worked great. We would use it in our living room with 6-8 people and those online could hear us clearly with no feedback. My husband and I would also use it when playing games together online so that our microphones wouldn't echo each other. The mute button in the middle is also very convenient, making it easy to quickly mute yourself if there is a lot of background noise going on.It has held up over the years and I would definitely go with this if you're looking for a microphone on a budget. I've never used it for professional streaming, but I might go with a higher-quality option if that was my goal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great External Microphone - Excellent noise cancelling features
reviews.reviewText: Great for conferences. Omni-directional. Will not pick up on background noises such as computer fans, etc. this is an excellent value if you need an external microphone for professional quality sound into audioconferences, etc..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I bought the first one a while back but never thought to really test it, I just assumed it was working as I was only sitting 2' from it. When I needed a second mic for a different PC I ordered another. The new one was an out of the box failure. It was recognized and lit up but didn't work at all, even on the PC that had my original mic on it. I decided then to test the other mic from about 2'. It was TERRIBLE, barely picking up my voice unless I was yelling. I'm actually upset with myself for not testing it earlier. I've been in so many Zoom calls and just assumed it was the far end having sound issues given that I'm running a gaming PC on a Gig fiber connection but lo and behold it was this awful mic causing clipping and attenuation issues. I returned the broken one but I'm stuck with the other one. I really liked the design so it's a shame but function over form is better in a crucial piece of hardware. I ordered a ZaxSounds to replace it and it is MUCH better for about the same price. I'm talking night and day. I've been working in video conferencing since there's been video conferencing and the rule is always audio is more important than video. Do yourself a favor and get the ZaxSounds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product is easy to install, use and functions consistently well. I office from home and it makes my life much easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Why'd you stop?
reviews.reviewText: Initially, I loved this microphone. It picked up anywhere in the room and sounded great. Problem is it stopped working after only a couple months. If you want to replace it every couple months, go for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great conference microphone that works with Linux
reviews.reviewText: We were running Windows with a Movo MC1000 conference microphone. Since Windows seem to want to do lengthy upgrades when we needed to do conferences, I suggested moving to Linux (Mint 21.2). The Movo microphone would not work with Linux. This microphone was recognized by Linux (and Windows), had a better range, and was a much lower price than the Movo.

I use this with signal, for voice chats. super clear on the other end and doesn't pick up ambient noises. I appreciate the touch button to activate and deactivate the mike. It displays green when on and red off, so you know your mic is not active when not needed.
I use this product for dictation of notes in a clinic. I love it. I recommend it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Does EXACTLY what it's meant to do
reviews.reviewText: We have been using a Blue Snowball mike for family Zoom sessions but a Win 11 update means the drivers no longer work. So I looked around for a replacement and while there were a number of similar omnidirectional mikes out there and this one looked good, and economical, some of them seemed to have difficulties with drivers. This one arrived, plug and play, worked perfectly first time, and just, well, works. We have it set up on a long (5 metre) USB extension, and it works perfectly. What more could you possibly want?

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice product at a very attractive price.
reviews.reviewText: Installed it for a board room at office. The mute button on the mic is a great feature. Makes it very convenient for non-tech people to use the mic rather than hunt for an on screen mute button.
